news.title: Applebee’s and IHOP Embrace AI to Revolutionize Dining Experience
news.body: Applebee’s and IHOP, under Dine Brands, are integrating AI technology across 3,500 stores to enhance customer service and optimize operations. This strategic move, affecting 300 franchisees, aims to personalize interactions and streamline processes, setting a new standard in the hospitality industry.

news.title: UK Government Expands Open Banking with Smart Data Group
news.body: The UK's Smart Data Group initiative is set to extend open banking principles to other sectors, potentially unlocking £28 billion in economic value. By facilitating secure data sharing, this move could revolutionize multiple industries, replicating the transformative impact seen in financial services.

news.title: Coinbase Launches Stablecoin Payment Service for Global Merchants
news.body: Coinbase has introduced a new stablecoin payment service, allowing merchants worldwide to accept payments in USDC. This development not only simplifies transactions but also enhances security, reinforcing Coinbase's influence in the digital payments arena.

news.title: Visa Advocates for Robust Stablecoin Strategies in Financial Institutions
news.body: Visa is pushing for the adoption of blockchain-based settlement systems in the CEMEA region, urging financial institutions to develop comprehensive stablecoin strategies. This initiative underscores Visa's commitment to integrating cutting-edge blockchain technology into mainstream financial ecosystems.

news.title: X Ventures into Financial Services with Trading and Payment Solutions
news.body: X, formerly Twitter, is expanding its business model to include trading services and is exploring the launch of its own payment cards. This strategic pivot marks X's entry into the financial services sector, potentially disrupting traditional banking and payment systems.
